channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AZ
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AZ

item.title: Report E-2023090257
item.description:
Report E-2023090257

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-14T03:11:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-24
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report X-2023081610
item.description:
Report X-2023081610

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: CHANDLER
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The package was unloaded and placed into a Hazardous bag/tote and brought to the damage cage for staging. Then transferred to the hazmat cage for recording. DescribePack: One cap seal has a small hole/ puncture slight. I noticed the original tape was still intact when being inspected. The bottles of alcohol have been packed incorrectly. The bottles were shipped upside down caused the caps to be the base during shipping. Approximately 3 cups have been leaked. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a Hazardous bag/tote.

item.title: Report X-2023080884
item.description:
Report X-2023080884

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the north unload at door 54 where it was leaking inside the trailer and was placed into a hazmat bag and taken to QA hut to be processed. DescribePack: One of the bottles had a missing cap which caused all liquid to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat bag was placed into a yellow drum where it sit in the hazmat cage waiting for disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023080462
item.description:
Report X-2023080462

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-01
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECEIVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE ON THE UNLOAD WALL. UPON ARRIVAL, RESPONDER IDENTIFIED SAID LEAKING PACKAGE. PLACED LEAKING PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.

item.title: Report E-2023080839
item.description:
Report E-2023080839

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-07T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted and that one of the metal 5 gallon can of cibond (un1133) had been crushed by other freight and had released 1 quart of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
